cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.caption: A Negroni
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

cocktails.name: Porto Flip
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker or mixer with ice.  Strain into glass, garnish and serve
ingredients: 4.5 cl (9 parts) port wine or port

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass, add mint.
cocktails.name: Cooperstown Cocktail

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: French Connection
John Collins
ingredients: 3 cl (2 parts) freshly squeezed lemon juice
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.

cocktails.name: Michelada
cocktails.caption: Michelada in a salt-rimmed glass
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Unspecified
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Between the Sheets
Horse's Neck
cocktails.footNotes: IBA classifies this drink as a long drink.
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.
cocktails.garnish: Long spiral of lemon zest (ingredient) or zest

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Angel Face
Tuxedo
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.  Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.
Shake all ingredients in an ice-filled shaker or cocktail shaker. Strain into chilled martini or Cocktail glass or cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Queens

cocktails.caption: An Irish Car Bomb with [[Baileys Irish Cream]].
cocktails.preparationInstructions: The whiskey is floated on top of the Irish cream in a shot glass, and the shot glass is then dropped into the stout
ingredients: Guinness or Guinness stout, Baileys Irish Cream, and Jameson Irish Whiskey
cocktails.name: Irish Car Bomb
Hanky Panky
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

cocktails.name: Bee's Knees
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir honey syrup with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass
cocktails.garnish: Optionally garnish with lemon or orange zest

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain
cocktails.name: Bijou Cocktail
Cloister
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Combine ingredients with ice in cocktail shaker; shake well, then strain into cocktail glass, pouring over ice.
cocktails.notes: 0.5 tsp of simple sugar solution or superfine sugar can added for a sweeter cocktail. The Cloister is normally made using dry gin. The cocktail can be served off the rocks, with no ice in the glass. This recipe, more suited to a larger cocktail glass, calls for: *1.5 oz gin (6 parts) *0.5 oz grapefruit juice (2.5 parts) *0.25 oz lemon juice (1 part) *0.5 oz yellow chartreuse (1 part)

cocktails.caption: A Clover Club Cocktail made with Gin, Lemon Juice, and Grenadine.
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.
ingredients: 1 egg white or 20 ml aquafaba or 4 drops cocktail foamer
cocktails.name: Clover Club Cocktail
Gimlet
cocktails.caption: A variant of the cocktail, the vodka gimlet, replaces gin with vodka.
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Mix and serve. Garnish with a slice of lime
ingredients: One part sweetened Lime (fruit) or lime juice

cocktails.name: Bumbu
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Unspecified

cocktails.name: Breakfast martini
ingredients: 3/4 shot (18.75 ml) Cointreau or triple sec
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Mix or shake in cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Strain into glass and serve.
Shake well over ice cubes in a cocktail shaker or shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Monkey Gland
Brandy Alexander
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Gibson
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir well in a cocktail shaker or shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish and serve

cocktails.name: Derby
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint in the drink.
Mix in a standard pint glass equal parts lager and cider
cocktails.name: Snakebite

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Combine gin, syrup, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.  Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass.  Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: French 75
Bramble
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.
Shake together over ice.  Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.
cocktails.name: Paradise
Sazerac
cocktails.caption: A Sazerac at the Sazerac Bar, [[The Roosevelt New Orleans Hotel]]
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.

cocktails.name: Chicago Cocktail
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake or stir with ice.

cocktails.name: Salty dog
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake gin and grapefruit juice in cocktail shaker. Strain into a salt-rimmed highball glass.

cocktails.caption: A layered Black Velvet cocktail with the stout on the top
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Mix equal parts stout and Champagne or cider without ice.
cocktails.name: Black Velvet

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir the DDT into the gin and serve
cocktails.notes: DDT is not very soluble in gin so only a small quantity will dissolve.  DDT has been known to numerous health problems in humans.
cocktails.name: Mickey Slim

cocktails.caption: Two greyhound cocktails
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Mix vodka and juice, pour over ice in Old Fashioned glass
cocktails.name: Greyhound
Vesper
cocktails.caption: Vesper
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the garnish.

cocktails.name: Alexander
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.
Shake in an iced cocktail shaker, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
cocktails.name: 20th Century

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Sidecar
Blackthorn
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Fill mixing glass with gin, vermouth, and bitters. Add ice and stir until chilled, then add strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.
ingredients: 2 oz sloe gin or 2 oz Irish whiskey

cocktails.name: Old Etonian
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a stemmed cocktail glass.
ingredients: 1.5 oz. Lillet or Kina Lillet or Cocchi Americano
2 dashes Creme de Noyaux or Crème de Noyaux

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.
cocktails.image: White Lady - Beefeater gin, Cointreau, fresh lemon juice (12403540403).jpg
cocktails.notes: This cocktail is a variant of the Sidecar
cocktails.name: White Lady

cocktails.caption: Death in the Afternoon
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour one jigger absinthe into a Champagne glass. Add iced Champagne until it attains the proper opalescent milkiness. Drink three to five of these slowly. by Hemingway
cocktails.name: Death in the Afternoon
Pisco Sour
cocktails.caption: Peruvian pisco sour
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Vigorously shake contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then strain into a glass and garnish with bitters.
ingredients: Several drops of aromatic bitters at the end

cocktails.name: Bacardi Cocktail
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake together with ice.  Strain into glass and serve
ingredients: 2 cl Lime juice or lime juice

cocktails.name: Jack Rose
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Traditionally shaken into a chilled glass, garnished, and served straight up.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.caption: Studio photo of a caipirinha
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça.
cocktails.notes: A wide variety of fresh fruits can be used in place of lime. In the absence of cachaça, vodka can be used, making a Caipiroska.

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir together and serve over ice.
cocktails.name: Brass Monkey
Casino
cocktails.caption: Casino
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.

cocktails.name: Dry Martini
cocktails.caption: The martini is one of the most widely known cocktails
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

cocktails.caption: Stinger cocktail served over ice in a rocks glass
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass.  May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktails.notes: It has been suggested that during the 1920s the Stinger ceased being an after-dinner cocktail, and instead should be consumed before dinner.
cocktails.name: Stinger
Gin and tonic
cocktails.caption: Gin and tonic with lime wedge
cocktails.preparationInstructions: In a glass filled with ice cubes, add gin and tonic.
cocktails.garnish: A slice of Lime (fruit) or lime

cocktails.name: Bronx
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour into cocktail shaker all ingredients with ice cubes, shake well. Strain in chilled Cocktail glass or cocktail or martini glass.

cocktails.name: Damn the Weather
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass
ingredients: 1/4 measure orange curacao or triple sec

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Unspecified
cocktails.name: Black and Tan
Tom Collins
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Mix the gin, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water, garnish and serve.
ingredients: 3 cL (2 parts) freshly squeezed lemon juice
1.5 cL (1 part) simple syrup or sugar syrup
6 cL (4 parts) carbonated water to taste

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Squeeze juice from lime wedges into a highball glass. Place one of the lime wedges into the glass and add sugars.  Muddle sugar with the lime wedges. Be careful not to overdo the muddling of the lime rind as it may make the drink too bitter. Pour in vodka and stir well until the sugar is dissolved. Add crushed ice and stir to melt some of the ice. Garnish with lime slice or wedge and serve.
ingredients: 1/2 Lime (fruit) or Lime, cut into wedges
cocktails.name: Caipiroska
Piña Colada
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Blend all the ingredients with ice in an electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve.

cocktails.caption: Classic Daiquiri served in a cocktail glass
cocktails.preparationInstructions: In a cocktail shaker add all ingredients. Stir well to dissolve the sugar. Add ice and shake. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Daiquiri
Blue Lagoon
cocktails.preparationInstructions: pour vodka and blue curacao in a shaker with ice, shake well & strain into ice filled highball glass, top with lemonade, or lemon juice, garnish and serve.
cocktails.image: Blue Lagoon at the Mandarin Oriental, Washington DC.jpg
cocktails.garnish: lemon slice or Garnish the brim with an orange slice

cocktails.caption: A Black Russian cocktail
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: Black Russian
Suffering Bastard
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake everything but ginger beer with ice, pour unstrained into glass, top with ginger beer.

cocktails.caption: Hot buttered rum in a mug
cocktails.preparationInstructions: In a mug, dissolve the sugar cubes in a little hot water. Add rum and butter. Fill the mug with hot water. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.
cocktails.name: Hot buttered rum
Paloma
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour tequila into highball glass. Squeeze lime juice. Add ice and salt, then top with soda and stir gently.

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.caption: The Long Island iced tea was named for its visual resemblance to non-alcoholic iced tea.
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Optionally garnish with lemon slice.
ingredients: 1.5 cl  Light rum or White rum

cocktails.preparationInstructions: The shot of sake is dropped into the beer, causing it to fizz violently.  The drink should then be consumed immediately.
cocktails.image: Sake bomb - man pounds table with fist.jpg
cocktails.name: Sake bomb

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour the tea into a cup. Pour the rum in and stir.
cocktails.name: Gunfire
Tommy's margarita
cocktails.caption: Tommy's margarita as it is served at Tommy's
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Cojito
cocktails.preparationInstructions: In a shaker add white rum, Malibu, lime juice, some mint leaves and crushed ice, garnish with the sprig of mint.
ingredients: 1 sprig of Apple mint or mint
cocktails.garnish: Trimmed coconut and Apple mint or mint leaf

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Mix carefully to avoid releasing the dissolved carbon dioxide.
cocktails.notes: Variation — If champagne is used instead of soda pop, the drink is known as a Slammer Royale
ingredients: One part 7 Up, ginger ale, Sprite (soft drink) or Sprite, or Mountain Dew
cocktails.name: Tequila Slam/Coscorron
Caesar
cocktails.caption: Caesar made with 2 shots of vodka, a pinch of horseradish, a little spicy with 5 dashes of tabasco, made muddy with about 10 dashes of Worcestershire, all over ice, and filled to the top of a celery salt and spice rimmed glass with Clamato juice.
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Rim glass with celery salt, and a lime wedge.
cocktails.garnish: stalk of celery and wedge of lime (fruit) or lime

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt.
ingredients: 1.5 cL (3 parts) Lime (fruit) or lime juice

cocktails.caption: A hurricane served in the typical glass at [[Pat O'Brien's Bar|Pat O'Brien's]], New Orleans
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, then pour into the glass and serve over ice.
cocktails.image: File:Made it to Pat O'Brien's for lunch and a hurricane.jpg
cocktails.notes: Some versions add orange juice, pineapple juice, and grenadine.
cocktails.name: Hurricane

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir together and serve over ice.
cocktails.name: Brass Monkey
Appletini (aka Apple Martini)
cocktails.caption: Top view of an Apple Martini
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Mix in a cocktail shaker or shaker, then pour into a chilled glass.  Garnish and serve.

cocktails.name: Cuban Sunset
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Fill highball (tall) glass with ice. Mix lime soda, lemonade, guava nectar, and grenadine syrup together to form a mixture. Pour rum into glasses over ice, then evenly layer the guava mixture over the rum. Mix as desired. Garnish with a half-slice of lemon.
ingredients: 9 cl (6 parts) carbonated lime (fruit) or lime soda
4 cl (2 parts) guava or guava nectar

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Layer the two spirits in the shot glass, with the high-proof liquor on top.  Light the shot and allow it to burn; then extinguish it by dropping it into the beer glass. Drink immediately.
cocktails.name: Flaming Doctor Pepper
Tequila sunrise
cocktails.caption: A tequila sunrise demonstrating its resemblance to a sunrise, in a stemware rather than the usual collins glass
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice.  Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom.  Stir gently to create the sunrise effect.  Garnish and serve.
cocktails.garnish: Orange (fruit) or orange slice and cherry

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Pour unstrained into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.
ingredients: 3 cl rum or amber Jamaican rum
3 cl rum or Martinique molasses rum
cocktails.garnish: spearmint leaves and Lime (fruit) or lime shell

cocktails.name: Agent Orange
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Mix in an old fashioned glass with ice and serve.

cocktails.name: Vampiro
cocktails.caption: Vampiro cocktail in a highball glass, garnished with a slice of an Orange and a chili pepper.
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour ingredients into glass rimmed with salt. Stir.
ingredients: Few slices fresh red hot chili pepper
cocktails.garnish: Salt on the rim. Chili pepper (optional)

cocktails.name: Bushwacker
cocktails.caption: homemade Bushwacker
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Blend all the ingredients together in a blender, including the ice, and then strain into a hurricane glass. Place cherry on top of the drink as a garnish and serve. Whipped cream can also be added as a garnish to the top of the drink before the cherry.
ingredients: 2 ounces Cream of coconut or Cream of Coconut

cocktails.name: Chimayó Cocktail
cocktails.caption: Chimayó Cocktail at Rancho de Chimayo, New Mexico
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour the tequila and unfiltered apple cider into glass over ice.  Add the lemon juice and creme de cassis and stir.  Garnish and serve.
cocktails.image: Chimayo Cocktail at Rancho de Chimayo, Chimayo NM.jpg

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Muddler or Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish with sprig of mint leaves and lemon slice. Serve with straw.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons sugar (or 2 cl of sugar syrup)
cocktails.garnish: sprig of mint (Mentha nemorosa or Yerba buena in the original recipe), slice of lime

cocktails.name: Macuá
cocktails.caption: Frozen Macuá made with [[Flor de Caña]] extra dry brand.
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Blend the ingredients with 1 cup of ice and serve well chilled. Garnish with an orange slice

cocktails.name: El Presidente
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir well with ice, then strain into glass.  Garnish and serve.
cocktails.garnish: twist of orange (fruit) or orange peel

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass
cocktails.name: Yellow Bird

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Whisk the raw egg yolk and honey/sugar into 3/4 cup hot sake (hot enough to lightly cook the egg – 1:30 in the microwave).
cocktails.notes: An alternative preparation method is to heat the sake/egg/honey mixture together, while whisking occasionally. Be careful to stop cooking before it turns into scrambled eggs.
ingredients: One raw egg (or egg yolk only)
cocktails.name: Tamagozake
Bloody Mary
cocktails.caption: A Bloody Mary garnished with celery served with ice cubes in a Highball glass
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.
cocktails.image: Bloody Mary Coctail with celery stalk - Evan Swigart.jpg

cocktails.name: Painkiller
cocktails.caption: A Painkiller and a bottle of Pussers
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake and garnish.
ingredients: 1 part coconut milk#cream of coconut or cream of coconut

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Mix in pitcher with crushed ice, shake vigorously until a frothing head appears. Strain into cocktail glasses. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry. Serves 6.
cocktails.name: Bermuda Rum Swizzle

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour vodka, then Cherry Heering over ice.
cocktails.name: Red Russian

cocktails.caption: A mixed White Russian
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour coffee liqueur and vodka into an Old Fashioned glass filled with ice. Float fresh cream on top and stir slowly.
ingredients: 2 cl (2 parts) List of liqueurs#Coffee liqueurs or Coffee liqueur
cocktails.name: White Russian
Brooklyn
cocktails.caption: Brooklyn cocktail
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served straight up.
ingredients: 2 oz Rye whiskey or Canadian whisky
1/4 oz Sirop de Picon or a few dashes of Angostura bitters

cocktails.name: Boulevardier
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir with ice, strain, garnish and serve.
ingredients: 45 ml (1.5 parts) bourbon whiskey or bourbon

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Fill a highball glass 3/4 with ice. Pour in ingredients and stir.
ingredients: 1.5 fl oz rye whiskey or blended whiskey
cocktails.name: Horsefeather
Kamikaze
cocktails.caption: Kamikaze cocktail, served straight up in a cocktail glass
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

cocktails.name: Lemon Drop Martini
cocktails.caption: Lemon drop martinis
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with sugar rim around the glass.
Crack an egg into a tall glass, leaving the yolk unbroken. Pour in whiskey or vodka. Add Tabasco to taste, or serve on the side.
cocktails.name: Amber Moon

cocktails.caption: Traditional Irish coffee
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Heat the coffee, whiskey and sugar; do not boil. Pour into glass and top with cream. Serve hot.
cocktails.name: Irish Coffee
Rusty Nail
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with a lemon twist. Serve.

cocktails.name: Platinum Blonde
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Combine ingredients with ice in cocktail shaker; shake well, then strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with rosemary sprig.

cocktails.caption: A Bobby Burns cocktail
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Put all liquid ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice. Squeeze lemon peel on top. Stir, strain into glass.
cocktails.name: Bobby Burns
Old fashioned
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a few dashes of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Garnish with orange slice or zest, and a cocktail cherry.
ingredients: 4.5 cl Bourbon whiskey or Bourbon or Rye whiskey
Few Dash (cooking) or dashes Angostura bitters
cocktails.garnish: Orange slice or Zest and cocktail cherry

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour whiskey into Collins glass filled with ice.  Fill to desired level with 7 Up. Stir lightly.
ingredients: 1 shot glass or shot Seagram's Seven Crown whiskey
cocktails.name: Seven and Seven
Black Nail
cocktails.caption: Black Nail
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes and then add the Irish whiskey and then Irish Mist. Stir gently.
cocktails.notes: Traditionally a Black Nail uses blood red oranges for the fruit.

cocktails.name: Sea Breeze
cocktails.caption: Sea Breeze
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.caption: A classic 2:1 Manhattan, made with a whisky, sweet vermouth, bitters and a cherry
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

Shake the vodka and citrus juices in a mixer, then strain into the glass. Slide the grenadine down one side of the glass, where it will sink to the bottom. Slide the Curaçao down the other side, to lie between the vodka and grenadine, and serve before the layers have a chance to mix.
cocktails.name: Colombia
Gimlet
cocktails.caption: A vodka gimlet with mint
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Mix and serve. Garnish with a slice of lime
ingredients: 1 part sweetened Lime or lime juice

cocktails.name: Vesper
cocktails.caption: Vesper
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the garnish.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.caption: A cosmopolitan garnished with a lemon twist
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake all ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime slice.
cocktails.notes: The drink should be a frothy bright pink color

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour Jack Daniel's into Collins glass filled with ice.  Fill to desired level with lemonade.  Stir lightly and garnish with lime and mint.
cocktails.name: Farnell
Cape Codder
cocktails.caption: Cape Codder
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice and stir briefly to combine. Garnish with lime wedge.
cocktails.image: Cape Codder, Tommy Doyles Irish Pub, Hyannis MA.jpg

cocktails.name: Screwdriver
cocktails.caption: Screwdriver
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.
cocktails.image: Screwdriver, Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport, Birmingham AL.jpg

cocktails.name: Harvey Wallbanger
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top.  Garnish and serve.
cocktails.garnish: Orange (fruit) or orange slice and maraschino cherry

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Mix thoroughly and drink quickly.
ingredients: 1 part vodka (Ratio varies according to taste.)
cocktails.name: Yorsh
Lynchburg Lemonade
cocktails.caption: Lynchburg Lemonade
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Top with the lemonade or lemon-lime. Add ice and stir. Garnish with lemon slices and cherries.
cocktails.image: Lynchburg Lemonade, Grindhouse Killer Burgers, Atlanta GA.jpg

cocktails.name: Fizzy Apple Cocktail
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Combine all three ingredients into a chilled glass and serve with ice and garnish.
add vodka, cream soda, coffee liqueur then orange juice to a highball class
cocktails.name: Orange Tundra

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour Jack Daniel's whiskey into a Collins glass filled with ice. Fill to desired level with Coca-Cola. Stir lightly.
cocktails.name: Jack and Coke
Vieux Carré
cocktails.caption: Vieux Carré
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange zest and a maraschino cherry.
cocktails.garnish: Orange (fruit) or Orange zest and maraschino cherry

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour Kahlua into shot glass. Layer Midori on top. Carefully add Baileys, letting it float on top to finish.
ingredients: 1 part Baileys Irish Cream, cream liqueur
cocktails.name: Quick Fuck

cocktails.preparationInstructions: The Crème de menthe is poured into the shot glass and the Amarula is carefully layered on top.
ingredients: 3cl (3 parts) Crème de menthe, mint liqueur
cocktails.name: Springbokkie
Orgasm
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Build all ingredients over ice in an old fashioned glass or shot glass.

cocktails.caption: An Irish Car Bomb with [[Baileys Irish Cream]].
cocktails.preparationInstructions: The whiskey is floated on top of the Irish cream in a shot glass, and the shot glass is then dropped into the stout
cocktails.name: Irish Car Bomb

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: 3 cl crème de menthe (green) mint liqueur
3 cl crème de cacao (white), chocolate liqueur
cocktails.name: Grasshopper

cocktails.caption: A porrón with kalimotxo and the used bottle of 1983 vintage wine.
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir together over plenty of ice.
ingredients: 1 part cola or another carbonated soft drink
cocktails.name: Kalimotxo
Mimosa
cocktails.caption: Two Mimosas
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.
cocktails.image: Pool-side Mimosas at The Standard Hotel.jpg

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up champagne.
ingredients: 1 cl (0.33 ounce) (1 part) crème de cassis, blackcurrant liqueur
cocktails.notes: A recipe can be found at the International Bartenders Association website.
cocktails.name: Kir royal

cocktails.caption: Bellini Cipriani
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour peach purée into chilled glass, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.
cocktails.image: Bellini Cipriani, Macaroni Grill, Dunwoody GA.jpg
cocktails.notes: Traditionally a Bellini uses white peaches for the fruit.
cocktails.name: Bellini

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.
cocktails.notes: A recipe can be found at the [[International Bartenders Association]] website.
cocktails.name: Kir
Whiskey Sour
cocktails.caption: A whiskey sour with ice cubes and a lemon slice
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve.
cocktails.notes: If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.
cocktails.garnish: Maraschino cherry and half orange slice

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Half of pineapple juice and half of cava, plus a splash of whiskey, plus a splash of cognac or triple sec. Stir everything well and then add a lot of whipped cream. Serve it in a pitcher with lots of ice and drink it in champagne glasses.
cocktails.name: Agua de Sevilla
Up to Date
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Add sherry, rye whiskey, mariner, and bitters to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until chilled. Strain into a chilled glass, garnish with a lemon twist.
cocktails.notes: For a sweeter cocktail, substitute dry sherry with sweet sherry and rye whiskey with bourbon

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Float Irish cream on top of coffee liqueur
cocktails.name: Baby Guinness
cocktails.notes: Variation substitutes black Sambuca for coffee liqueur

cocktails.name: B-52
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Layer ingredients into a shot glass.  Serve with a stirrer.
ingredients: 2 cl Baileys Irish Cream cream liqueur

cocktails.name: Hugo
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir together over plenty of ice.
ingredients: 2 cl elderflower or lemon balm syrup

cocktails.name: Toronto
cocktails.caption: Toronto cocktail served on the rocks
ingredients: 0.25 oz chilled water or wet ice
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Americano
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into an old fashioned glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice and a lemon twist.
cocktails.garnish: half an orange slice, lemon twist

cocktails.name: Japanese Slipper
cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake together in a cocktail shaker or mixer with ice.  Strain into glass, garnish and serve.
ingredients: 3 cl (1 part) Midori liqueur, melon liqueur

cocktails.caption: A shot of Jägermeister dropped into a glass of Red Bull, creating a Jägerbomb
cocktails.preparationInstructions: The shot glass of Jägermeister is dropped into the Red Bull by the bartender or the customer
cocktails.name: Jägerbomb

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Pour into highball glass over rocks. Stir.
cocktails.name: Alabama Slammer

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Heat the coffee; do not boil. Pour into cup and add the alcohol; serve hot.
cocktails.name: Karsk

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Combine Jägermeister and schnapps in glass full of ice.  Add cranberry juice to fill to top.  Stir as necessary.
cocktails.notes: may also be served as a shooter - chilled and shaken, without ice
cocktails.name: Redheaded slut

cocktails.preparationInstructions: Shake with cracked ice.  Strain into glass and serve.
cocktails.name: Golden Dream
